SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_CHILDREN_SETINELIGIBLE
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Set a list of chidlren to be ineligible with a specific reason
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_CHILDREN_SETINELIGIBLE ( @childIDList USR_UDT_CHILDIDLIST readonly, -- The children to be set ineligible @sponsorshipReasonID uniqueidentifier, -- Used to specify the sponsorship reason to add @changeAgentID uniqueidentifier) -- Used to specify change agent for CHANGEDBYID and ADDEDBYID fields
as begin -- Eligibility code value constant declare @eligibilityCode_Ineligible tinyint = 2
-- Get ChangeAgent if none was passed into the sproc if @changeAgentID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @changeAgentID output
-- Used for setting date fields to today's date declare @currentDate datetime = null set @currentDate = getdate()
-- Update sponsorship opportunity to set child/children to ineligble and set the reason to what was passed in update dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY set ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Ineligible, SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @sponsorshipReasonID, CHANGEDBYID = @changeAgentID, DATECHANGED = @currentDate
where exists (select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID from @childIDList where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY.ID) and not (ELIGIBILITYCODE = @eligibilityCode_Ineligible and SPONSORSHIPREASONID = @sponsorshipReasonID) -- Filter out those already ineligible with the same reason
return 0 end
